item.title: 中正紀念堂 Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall / 台灣台北 Tai
item.dc:creator: gt3dev
item.excerpt:encoded:
The Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall (中正紀念堂) is a monument erected in memory of Chiang Kai-shek, the forcer President of the Republic of China (Taiwan).
The Memorial Hall is white with four sides. The octagonal roof is covered with blue glazed tiles. The blue and white colors of the building and the red color of the flowerbeds echo the colors in the flag of Taiwan. The octagonal shape picks up with the symbolism of the number 8, a number traditionally associated in Asia with abundance and good fortune. Two sets of white stairs, each with 89 steps to represent Chiang’s age at the time of his death, lead to the main entrance.
# More Information + http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Chiang_Kai-shek_Memorial_Hall

item.content:encoded: This tab includes the options which allow you to set the global settings applied for a Gallery Album slider. There is available the Fit style option (cover slide, fit always, fit horizontal, fit vertical) that helps to set images look on the desktop view. It’s easy to manage Show controls Yes/No option, images Autoplay Yes/No and indicate Slide Interval In Milliseconds. Please note, you can also manage settings for every slider individually while creating a slider.

item.title: Albums Grid With Info

item.content:encoded: Hi, I am Tommy Lum. A creative photographer and traveler making emotional photography communicate a story. That's it. And this is my new website. Welcome!

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: gt3dev
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
